mapper.select: select p.ph_idx ,(select m2.mem_name from member m2 where m2.mem_id=p.ph_name) as ph_name,p.ph_ip,p.ph_state ,m.mem_name,d.dept_name ,p.ph_date ,p.pm_idx from payhistory p inner join member m on p.ph_line =m.mem_id inner join depart d on m.dept_num =d.dept_num where pm_idx =#{param1} order by ph_idx desc;
